alert.note: Alert for North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 11:40PM PST until December 01 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST THURSDAY ABOVE 500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...North Oregon Coast. * WHEN...Until noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Spotty accumulations are possible down to the lowest elevations, mainly north of Tillamook. Sticking snow has already been observed on webcams near Warrenton and Camp Rilea.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com
